se.hig.exte.restcontroller

Class ExamController

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.hig.exte.restcontroller.ExamController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/exams")
public class ExamController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a RestController class responsible for mapping HTTP requests for the /exams path. It contains mappings of end-points to CrudServices that operate on Exam records in the database.

    • Constructor Summary

      • ExamController

        @Autowired
public ExamController(ExamService examService,
                                  UnpublishService unpublishService,
                                  CookieHandler cookieHandler)
        Creates an ExamController object.
        Parameters:
        examService - The class used to perform add services exposed in this RestController.
        unpublishService - A CrudService class used to perform services exposed in this RestController.
        cookieHandler - object responsible for handling authentication.

    • Method Detail

      • saveExam

        @PostMapping(value="/")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Exam> saveExam(@Valid @RequestBody
                                                                                       @Valid Exam exam,
                                                                                       javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Creates an Exam and stores it in the database.
        Parameters:
        exam - The Exam to add in the form of a JSON-object in the POST request.
        request - The incoming HTTP request.
        Returns:
        A ResponseEntity object containing the saved Exam and an HTTP status code.

      • getExam

        @GetMapping(value="/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Exam> getExam(@PathVariable
                                                                                         int id)
        Fetches the Exam object with the given ID from the database.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the Exam to fetch.
        Returns:
        The Exam with the given ID.

      • getAllExams

        @GetMapping(value="/all")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<Exam>> getAllExams()
        Fetches all Exam records from the database and returns them as a ResponseEntity object. List of Exam objects is automatically converted to JSON using Spring Boot's HttpMessageConverter and put in the ResponseEntity's body.
        Returns:
        A ResponseEntity object containing the fetched Exam objects.

      • getExamByCourseId

        @GetMapping(value="/course/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<Exam>> getExamByCourseId(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                          int id)
        Fetches all Exam objects belonging to the specified Course ID. List of Exam objects is automatically converted to JSON using Spring Boot's HttpMessageConverter and put in the ResponseEntity's body.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the Course to which the Exams belongs.
        Returns:
        A ResponseEntity object containing a List of Exam objects.

      • patchExam

        @PatchMapping(value="/")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Exam> patchExam(@Valid @RequestBody
                                                                                         @Valid Exam exam,
                                                                                         javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Updates the Exam object with the given ID in the database.
        Parameters:
        exam - The Exam to update in the form of a JSON-object in the POST request.
        request - The incoming HTTP request.
        Returns:
        A ResponseEntity object containing the updated Exam and an HTTP status code.

        @GetMapping(value="/unpublished")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<Exam>> getUnpublishedExams(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Fetches all unpublished exams.
        Parameters:
        request - The incoming HTTP request.
        Returns:
        A list of all unpublished exams and the http status OK.

      • autoUnpublish

        @Scheduled(cron="0 0 3 * * *")
 @GetMapping(value="/testAuto")
public void autoUnpublish()
        This method is run automatically by Spring Boot at 03:00 every day.
